title: Forum icon why doesn't it change?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Since riot support offers 0 assistance with it now as stated by templar whatsherface 
how do i get my boards icon to change to my ingame icon?

replies.body:
Posting on the boards like this should prompt a sync to happen between your Summoner and Boards profiles. It can take a while for the Icon to update, though. We cannot manually update or change your icon, so you'll need to wait on the update to happen by itself.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
